About Me

Hi, I'm Sachchit, a 4th year computer science student at the University of Michigan, Ann Arbor. I found early on that I had a love of learning and a desire to create, which luckily translates well into a career in software engineering. My goal is to funnel that passion into designing and building software systems that can make our lives easier.

Over the past 4 years I've explored a variety of software engineering subdisciplines, eventually finding my niche in backend engineering. Outside of computer science, I also have a background in both mathematics and business.



If you're interested in what I'm up to, check out my GitHub page, and feel free to browse any of my posts.
